name: Mood Pond
description:
As the friendly neighbourhood frog, help your fishy friends find their feelings and experience personal growth along the way! Will you reach your final form? 

You have two bubble types (sad bubbles and angry bubbles) make sure you only give the sad bubbles to the sad fish, and the angry bubbles to the angry fish while dodging oblivious sea urchins. And don't shoot the happy fish!  

Extract the .zip and run player.exe

CONTROLS
Mouse to Move
1 and 2 to change Bubble Type
Left Click to Shoot Bubbles

CREDITS
Daeback - Animation, Programming
Okienoki - Animation, Programming, Music
